name: Tileable (JessHodgkiss)
description:
Tileable was created during the Create Chester game jam of November2022!

The game has some mechanical issues and was made during a 3 day period, alongside 5 other Games development students at the University of Chester. 

Platform: Windows

Made by:

Nathan Kingston: Programming, Audio, SFX 

 Thomas Woodthorpe: Programming, SFX 

 Liberty Jones: Character Art, Animation, UI 

 Jess Hodgkiss: 3D Environment Art 

 Daniel Dixon: 3D Environment Art 

 Ethan Corbett: 3D Environment Art
